医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过 CAR 增强剂疗法克服癌症复发尽管 CAR T 细胞疗法彻底改变了某些癌症的治疗方法，但仍存在一个重大局限性：许多患者，包括那些癌症完全缓解的患者，最终会复发。在一项新的研究中，丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员报告了一种有可能消除该问题的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Overcoming-cancer-relapse-with-CAR-Enhancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Overcoming-cancer-relapse-with-CAR-Enhancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9871784b-dc2e-442c-b53e-8fde3fa98e7a Fri, 26 Jul 2024 06:00:53 -0400 Overcoming cancer relapse with CAR-Enhancer therapy
细胞竞争决定女性体内 X 染色体的使用MRC 医学科学实验室淋巴发育小组在《自然遗传学》上发表的一项新研究表明，表达母本或父本 X 染色体的细胞的贡献可以选择性地偏向于身体的不同部位。该研究利用千人基因组计划的人类数据，结合人类 X 染色体相关 DNA 序列变异的小鼠模型，以增进我们对具有两条 X 染色体的生物学女性个体发育的基本理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Cellular-competition-determines-X-chromosome-usage-in-female-bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Cellular-competition-determines-X-chromosome-usage-in-female-bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ae76e4a-c067-4736-b97d-9d3ad0381a68 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 05:50:00 -0400 Cellular competition determines X chromosome usage in female bodies
焦虑对痴呆症发展的长期影响慢性、已解决和新发焦虑与全因痴呆（影响记忆和思维的进行性认知衰退）风险之间的纵向关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Anxietye28099s-Long-Term-Impact-on-Dementia-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Anxietye28099s-Long-Term-Impact-on-Dementia-Development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=364ab5ed-1548-46c7-9e47-7b43984fbf92 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Anxiety’s Long-Term Impact on Dementia Development
您的“外卖”咖啡是否超出了每日建议的咖啡因摄入量？各种流行咖啡中的咖啡因含量，以根据建议的每日摄入量评估其安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Are-your-e28098takeawaye28099-coffees-exceeding-daily-recommulated-levels-for-caffeine-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Are-your-e28098takeawaye28099-coffees-exceeding-daily-recommended-levels-for-caffeine-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d1cdc8d-f55f-45a1-85c7-658dc4b6646b Fri, 26 Jul 2024 05:00:00 -0400 Are your ‘takeaway’ coffees exceeding daily recommended levels for caffeine intake?
INTEGRA Biosciences 和 Parse Biosciences 提供经济实惠的自动化单细胞 RNA 测序INTEGRA Biosciences 和 Parse Biosciences 合作在 ASSIST PLUS 移液机器人上自动进行单细胞 RNA 测序 (scRNA-seq)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/INTEGRA-Biosciences-and-Parse-Biosciences-offer-affordable-automated-single-cell-RNA-sequencing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/INTEGRA-Biosciences-and-Parse-Biosciences-offer-affordable-automated-single-cell-RNA-sequencing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a58c0d-2da3-4e4e-b097-b461c0e46bc4 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 02:16:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences and Parse Biosciences offer affordable, automated single cell RNA sequencing
新研究将豆类与改善儿童饮食联系起来新的研究表明，美国儿童摄入更多豆类与显着的健康相关结果之间存在关联，该研究将于 2024 年田纳西州诺克斯维尔举行的营养教育与行为协会 (SNEB) 国际会议上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/New-study-links-beans-to-improved-diets-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/New-study-links-beans-to-improved-diets-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5429a9df-1c45-4d17-ba6d-e19d9e1298c9 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 00:49:20 -0400 New study links beans to improved diets in children
研究揭示折叠肽中的电子传输增强是什么将电子肽置于肽中？根据《美国国家科学院院刊》上的一项新研究，这是一种折叠结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Study-reveals-enhanced-electron-transport-in-folded-peptides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240726/Study-reveals-enhanced-electron-transport-in-folded-peptides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb89d3f0-3376-4fdc-ab35-ea6a9b084760 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 00:32:49 -0400 Study reveals enhanced electron transport in folded peptides
H5N1 禽流感在美国奶牛中的惊人传播揭示了跨物种传播的危险研究人员发现，H5N1禽流感病毒已蔓延到美国的奶牛中，构成重大的跨物种传播风险。他们的多学科研究揭示了该病毒的进化及其人畜共患的可能性，强调需要加强生物安全措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Alarming-spread-of-H5N1-bird-flu-in-US-dairy-cattle-reveals-cross-species-transmission-dangers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Alarming-spread-of-H5N1-bird-flu-in-US-dairy-cattle-reveals-cross-species-transmission-dangers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f59f736a-61b6-43bf-9482-10ec1bc8d9eb Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Alarming spread of H5N1 bird flu in US dairy cattle reveals cross-species transmission dangers
新冠病毒大流行加速了大脑衰老，尤其是男性和贫困群体COVID-19 大流行加速了大脑衰老，尤其是男性和贫困家庭的大脑衰老，感染者的认知能力显着下降。无论 COVID-19 感染状况如何，都会观察到这种影响，凸显了社会心理压力源的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/COVID-pandemic-accelerated-brain-aging-special-in-males-and-deprived-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/COVID-pandemic-accelerated-brain-aging-special-in-males-and-deprived-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcbe90a-8d5b-41d7-9018-44daf711e488 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:27:00 -0400 COVID pandemic accelerated brain aging, especially in males and deprived groups
机器学习模型预测多发性硬化症的残疾进展比利时鲁汶大学的 Edward De Brouwer 及其同事本周在开放获取期刊 PLOS Digital Health 上发表的一项新研究表明，机器学习模型可以可靠地告知临床医生多发性硬化症的残疾进展情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Machine-learning-models-predict-disability-progression-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240725/Machine-learning-models-predict-disability-progression-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b8c37c-c628-4a0e-a7ba-32ae8afb0ec2 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Machine learning models predict disability progression in multiple sclerosis
